about_the_game:
Please note that accessing Growtopia requires a Ubisoft Account.

It's Your Sandbox, For Free
Discover a 2D playground where your imagination runs wild, Be anyone, create anything, and the best part? It's totally free!

A Global Community of Adventurers
Join a community of millions, where everyone's a creator and an adventurer just like you.

Create Wonders, Pixel by Pixel
Build your dream castle, or maybe a secret hideaway? The only limit is your imagination!

Unleash Your Inner Hero or Villain
Ever wanted to be a space knight or a noble queen? Here, you can be whoever you want to be!

Games Within the Game
Enjoy mini-games crafted by fellow players. From high-energy races to daring battles, there's always a new challenge waiting.

Trade and Craft Your Way
Whip up cool items and trade with others. The bustling marketplace is your oyster!

Always Fresh, Always Exciting
We keep things exciting with frequent updates. New items, events, and features make every day an adventure.

A Universe of Pixels, Waiting for You
A vibrant world that's yours to shape, one pixel at a time. Dive in and make it your own!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 - 3.3 GHz / AMD FX-4300 - 3.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 -2GB / AMD RX 460 -2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080Ti / AMD RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“A sandbox isn't a sandbox if you can't "Be anyone! Create anything!", and in Growtopia, the game's slogan rings truer than ever.”
POCKETGAMER

“Growtopia is a cute 2D sandbox MMO that emphasizes creativity and personalization over all else.”
GamingonPhone
short_description: Growtopia is a 2D sandbox game, that brings together millions of players in an expansive pixel world. Collaborate in building anything you can imagine, become anyone you want to be, and delve into numerous mini-games. Unleash your creativity and join the massive universe in Growtopia today!
